Feel empowered with knowledge, trends, and tools for sustainable living!
Samsung Extra Wide Bottom Mount Freezer

The Samsung RB6000D refrigerator is designed for energy efficiency, featuring a Digital Inverter Compressor. This technology adjusts the compressor speed based on cooling demand, reducing energy consumption and minimizing wear and tear.
Canadian & female-founded sustainable clothing brand dedicated to ethical clothing that is comfortable, travel-friendly & made in Canada.

An energy-efficient smart plug designed to control connected devices remotely through the Kasa Smart app. It helps reduce energy consumption by allowing users to schedule on/off times for appliances, monitor energy usage, and optimize power settings.
